question: Who won the best director award in the 30th Odisha State Film Award?
explanation: Manmohan Mohapatra won the best director award for the film\"Bhija Matira Swarga\" in the 30th Odisha State Film Award. Mihir Das won the best actor award for the same film.Â  Akshay Parija won Mohan Sunder Dev Goswami Samman and Bijay Mishra won the Jayadeva Award.
